text: Meiring is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Alton Meiring (born 1976), South African football player *Georg Meiring (born 1939), South African military commander *Lin Meiring (born 1933), South African swimmer *Piet Meiring, South African theologian *Sheila Meiring Fugard (born 1932), British-born South African short story writer *Steven Meiring (born 1984), South African rugby union player ==See also== *Meyrink Category:Afrikaans- language surnames
title: Meiring
